cbinstall.description: Provides groups with a Photo Gallery to easily and quickly share photos between one another.

param.name: groups_photo_create_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Input number of photos each individual user is limited to creating per group. If blank allow unlimited photos. Moderators and group owners are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_photo_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on group photos. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_photo_resample
param.label: Always Resample
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should always be resampled. Resampling adds additional security, but animations will only be kept when using ImageMagick.

param.name: groups_photo_image_height
param.label: Maximum Image Height
param.description: Input the maximum height in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: groups_photo_image_width
param.label: Maximum Image Width
param.description: Input the maximum width in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: groups_photo_thumbnail_height
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Height
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail height in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: groups_photo_thumbnail_width
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Width
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail width in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: groups_photo_maintain_aspect_ratio
param.label: Maintain Aspect Ratio
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should maintain their aspect ratio when resizing. If set to No the image will always be resized to the specified maximum width and height. If set to Yes the aspect ratio will be maintained as much as possible within the maximum width and height. If set to Yes with Cropping the image will always resize to the specified maximum width and height within the aspect ratio and crop any overflow; this is useful for maintain squared images.

param.name: groups_photo_min_size
param.label: Minimum File Size
param.description: Input the minimum image file size in KBs.

param.name: groups_photo_max_size
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: Input the maximum image file size in KBs. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.name: groups_photo_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: groups_photo_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed.

param.name: groups_photo_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on rows.
